io.github.nozyx12.ollama4j

Class OllamaClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.nozyx12.ollama4j.OllamaClient

  • public class OllamaClient
extends java.lang.Object
    Client for interacting with the Ollama API, allowing for chat exchanges with models.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      OllamaClient()
      Constructs a client with the default host IP (127.0.0.1) and port (11434).
      OllamaClient(java.lang.String hostIP, int hostPort)
      Constructs a client with a specified host IP and port.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Message chat(java.lang.String model, java.util.List<Message> messages)
      Sends a chat request to the Ollama API and returns the response.
      Message chat(java.lang.String model, java.util.List<Message> messages, float temperature)
      Sends a chat request to the Ollama API with a specified temperature and returns the response.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • OllamaClient

        public OllamaClient()
        Constructs a client with the default host IP (127.0.0.1) and port (11434).

      • OllamaClient

        public OllamaClient(java.lang.String hostIP,
                    int hostPort)
        Constructs a client with a specified host IP and port.
        Parameters:
        hostIP - the IP address of the host
        hostPort - the port number of the host

    • Method Detail

      • chat

        public Message chat(java.lang.String model,
                    java.util.List<Message> messages)
             throws java.lang.Exception
        Sends a chat request to the Ollama API and returns the response.
        Parameters:
        model - the name of the model to be used for the chat
        messages - the list of messages to send to the model
        Returns:
        the response message from the API
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the API request fails

      • chat

        public Message chat(java.lang.String model,
                    java.util.List<Message> messages,
                    float temperature)
             throws java.lang.Exception
        Sends a chat request to the Ollama API with a specified temperature and returns the response.
        Parameters:
        model - the name of the model to be used for the chat
        messages - the list of messages to send to the model
        temperature - the temperature setting for the model (controls response creativity)
        Returns:
        the response message from the API
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the API request fails
